previewArticle.title: Uruguay vs. Costa Rica: 2014 World Cup | Group D Preview

recapArticle.title: Uruguay 1, Costa Rica 3: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Group D Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: supporter
timelineItems.text: Leaving set piece master Roy Miller on the sidelines for later I see.... #RBNY #WorldCup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oscar Duarte (Costa Rica).
Diego Lugano (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ray Webster
timelineItems.text: Couple of good touches for Campbell so far. I hope Arsenal hang onto him next year. #worldcup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Derek
timelineItems.text: 9': #CRC's Joel Campbell showing early sign or two that if he gets a chance, he might make #URU pay. #URUvCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Adam Hennessey
timelineItems.text: Uruguay straight back to handling it in the box ;) #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Daniel Parker
timelineItems.text: Lugano doing his best Phil Jones face there. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: HOW...IS...THAT...NOT...A...PENALTY?! #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Walter Gargano (Uruguay).
Yeltsin Tejeda (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Uruguay. Diego Forlán tries a through ball, but Edinson Cavani is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Christian Bolaños with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Maddy Cat
timelineItems.text: Hopefully Suarez comes on, bites someone and gets banned for the England game #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Tamlyn
timelineItems.text: It's so fun to say Uruguay. OO-RAH-WHY. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Steven Burns
timelineItems.text: Always hated Uruguayan approach to football. Most cynical nation every time. Forlan the sportsman exception who proves the rule. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: xKimix
timelineItems.text: Any1 else having slow realisation that #CostaRica aren't as rubbish as we thought they would be? #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica).
Martín Cáceres (Uruguay) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: The Chairman Jeff
timelineItems.text: Hey...looks like Costa Rica is going to make a game of this. Don't know how much of that is about Uruguay... #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Babalola Damilola
timelineItems.text: Campbell having a nice game so far #AFC #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Martín Cáceres (Uruguay) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Forlán.

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans
timelineItems.text: #CRC escape but only just...rightfully ruled offsides but it was quite close...#URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: We Are Hooligans

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Edinson Cavani (Uruguay).

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Cavani may need to stick to his day job: 80's action movie villain... #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Morocco
timelineItems.text: As good as Cavani, he wastes too many chances #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Uruguay 1, Costa Rica 3.

timelineItems.name: Stephen Orihel
timelineItems.text: 3-1 final. #WorldCup2014 #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Joel Godfrey
timelineItems.text: What a great underdog story for Costa Rica and an amazing motm performance from Joel Campbell #URUvCRC #3-1

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: ICYMI: @salcipriano Everyone's just brushing off Costa Rica, but they are quite a pesky bunch. Don't count them completely out. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.desc: After Costa Rica shocked Uruguay with a 3-1 win in the opening Group D match, Jason Saghini asks whether or not Los Ticos can advance from the Group of Champions.
timelineItems.title: Will Costa Rica escape the Group of Champions? | Brazil Bound

timelineItems.name: Arka Ukil
timelineItems.text: Again penalty ??????? #UruvCrc

timelineItems.name: Dr. Kevin K. Durand
timelineItems.text: Rather a dramatic indication to the spot by the official. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Sportzar
timelineItems.text: #URUvCRC Another penalty. Another dubious call. Ok, not so much considering this is not a rugby match #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Time
timelineItems.text: So hard to focus on the game and root for Costa Rica with the entire Uruguay team wearing jerseys a size too small for their bodies #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: HITC Sport - Live
timelineItems.text: GOAL Uruguay *1-0 Costa Rica CAVANI (pen 24') #URUvCRC #URU #CRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: #O.Y.E.N.A®
timelineItems.text: Clear Penalty #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Kartik Krishnaiyer
timelineItems.text: Sadly that is the correct call. Hate it as the Ticos were playing well to this point. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Christopher James
timelineItems.text: Tough game this for Felix Brych to officiate. Missed a certain red card for #CRC, but spot on with the penalty for #URU. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Eamonn Warner
timelineItems.text: Excellent call by the referee. Holding like that in the box is rampant in modern football #URUvCRC

timelineItems.text: 27' Tiro desviado de Campbell #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Jöshua COYG Glöver
timelineItems.text: Campbell nearly scored a screamer for #CRC Looks like a pretty decent player! #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: HooliganArena
timelineItems.text: A rocket from Costa Rica's #9 Campbell goes just wide, but a great long distance effort #WorldCup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Yeltsin Tejeda (Costa Rica).

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: Everyone's just brushing off Costa Rica, but they are quite a pesky bunch. Don't count them completely out. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Craig Honeyman
timelineItems.text: Really looking forward to the game. Diego Godin is the man for man. Oozes class. #URUvCRC #Brazil2014

timelineItems.text: #URUvCRC HT CRC have yet to have a shot on target from 4 attempts. Passing (URU172/CRC176) and possession (49/51) are equal #WCStats #WC2014

timelineItems.name: Wayne Trollison
timelineItems.text: Beautiful Football high expectations are needed in the 2nd half #UruvCrc

timelineItems.name: Kwabena™
timelineItems.text: Campbell deserves a goal in this game #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: TAB Sport
timelineItems.text: Back at it. Quite a bit of feeling flowing for a draw... Costa Rica will need to risk a bit more for that big goal they require #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Uruguay 1, Costa Rica 0.

timelineItems.name: George D. Metellus
timelineItems.text: Don't have a rooting interest in #URUvCRC but since I'm CONCACAF by origin, I'd like to see Los Ticos do well.

timelineItems.text: Would love to see #CRC put some goals in today, but #URU will probably steal the show. #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: Interested to see just how good Uruguay are and whether Joel Campbell is ready to stake a claim in the #Arsenal squad #WorldCup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.text: Cavani 2 or more goals then, come on!!!! #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: James McGhan
timelineItems.text: Diego Godin to score 1st. #URUvCRC #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Eric Krakauer
timelineItems.text: #URUvCRC actually has all the makings of a very good game. #URU #CRC

timelineItems.name: Hunter McGaughey
timelineItems.text: OK, I am a fan of #URU kits. Didn't notice the sun light around the badge before. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Kevin Cummins
timelineItems.text: Uruguay's anthem was a jaunty little number. Costa Rica's has more pomp. On that basis, Uruguay to win by at least two goals. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.text: As a casual fan of Uruguay I'm thinking the 75th minute is when to bring Suarez on. It might not be enough. #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Joel Campbell (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Egidio Arévalo Rios (Uruguay).
Cristian Rodríguez (Uruguay) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica).
Corner,  Uruguay. Conceded by Michael Umaña.

timelineItems.name: Steveo
timelineItems.text: If #Suarez doesn't come on soon I'm going to bite my TV #Frustrated #WorldCup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Amy Garner
timelineItems.text: Uruguay freaking out, not controlling ball now. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Edinson Cavani (Uruguay).
Celso Borges (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Siphesihle  Mdabe
timelineItems.text: Even you weren't a soccer fan you'd still enjoy this match #WorldCup #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Costa Rica. Cristian Gamboa tries a through ball, but Joel Campbell is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Barnes
timelineItems.text: The minnow has the big fish on the run right now in Brazil. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Taygan Mullins
timelineItems.text: I'm expecting to see a fight on the pitch any time now #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Diego Godín.
Attempt missed. Giancarlo Gonzalez (Costa Rica) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Bryan Ruiz with a cross following a corner.
Offside, Uruguay. Diego Godín tries a through ball, but Abel Hernández is caught offside.
Oscar Duarte (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Stuani (Uruguay).

timelineItems.name: Hagel
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica, after contemplating a single rose, argues the entire second half whether truth is beauty or beauty is truth. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Southard
timelineItems.text: England and Italy have to be loving this. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Martín Cáceres (Uruguay).
Cristian Gamboa (Costa Rica) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Uruguay. Diego Lugano tries a through ball, but Edinson Cavani is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chrí。'14
timelineItems.text: whatever happens Uruguay, don't blame the result on the tight shirts #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Jim Hearson
timelineItems.text: Impact sub #CRC #URU #URUvCRC #WorldCup #WorldCupset

timelineItems.name: Sal Cipriano
timelineItems.text: WOOOOOOW!!! 3-1 COSTA RICA!!! HELLO, GROUP D!!!! #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Ethan Cardoza
timelineItems.text: Beautiful. So much beauty. #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Nick Wagner
timelineItems.text: WHAT. A. RUN. GOD. DAMMIT. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Cameron Collins
timelineItems.text: 3-1! Costa Rica has put the nail in the coffin. AMAZING! #URUvCRC #CRC #CONCACAF #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: José_Ranjo
timelineItems.text: OMG!! Costa Rica lead 3-1! Uruguay are done for! #URUvCRC #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.text: Nice work today, Ticos. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: Up. Set. City!!! #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Eric Santiago
timelineItems.text: Yes Costa Rica I'm happy you are showing the world you can beat Uruguay!!!!!!!!! #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Uruguay. Conceded by Júnior Díaz.

timelineItems.name: Arup Roychoudhury
timelineItems.text: What a World Cup this one is shaping up to be. 28th ranked Costa Rica on its way to trouncing 7th ranked Uruguay 3-1! #UruvCrc

timelineItems.comment: Joel Campbell (Costa Rica) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Martín Cáceres (Uruguay).

timelineItems.name: Jeff Johnson
timelineItems.text: Earning some #Respect right now #CONCACAF #URUvCRC #WorldCup #PuraVida 1,3 #Ticos #AOPDX #rctid

timelineItems.name: paris byrd
timelineItems.text: The tight jerseys have impaired Uruguay. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Ged Robinson
timelineItems.text: The beauty of the world cup, love these surprise results. Costa Rica thoroughly deserve their lead though. #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michael Barrantes (Costa Rica).
Maxi Pereira (Uruguay) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Philip Romanow
timelineItems.text: #URUvCRC Vamos CONCA-RICA !!!

timelineItems.name: Luke Zaki
timelineItems.text: Uruguay have been a joke, this being the must win game for them, Costa Rica fully deserve the win #URUvCRC

timelineItems.name: Mohammad Ashraful
timelineItems.text: Costa Rica is possessing very well. Better stay on it. #URUvCRC #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Bowyay
timelineItems.text: This Costa Rican defence needs to calm down, a little nervous at the back, promising going forward though #URUvCRC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Costa Rica. Conceded by Diego Lugano.

timelineItems.name: Joe Wilkins

timelineItems.text: Ouch, tensions boiling over now. Uruguay aren’t sure what to do. #URUVCRC
